findings.title: Divide Before Multiply
findings.description: Performing multiplication before division can cause loss of precision.

findings.title: Arbitrary Jump with Function Type Variable
DoS With Block Gas Limit
findings.description: Denial of Service (DoS) attack can occur when a contract uses block gas limit to restrict the amount of gas used in a transaction.

findings.title: Right-To-Left-Override control character(U+202E)
findings.description: The presence of Right-To-Left-Override control character (U+202E) can potentially cause issues with text rendering and interpretation.

findings.title: Presence of unused variables
findings.description: Unused variables are present in the contract.

findings.title: Hash Collisions With Multiple Variable Arguments
Message call with hardcoded gas amount
findings.description: The contract contains a message call with a hardcoded gas amount, which can lead to unintended behavior and potential security risks.
